attributes.action: Stand Trial For The illegal War In Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
war crimes, waging an illegal war, going against the U.N, ignoring public largest protests ever seen). sending Poorly equipped troops to fight and die in a pointless war, shady reasons (which change fairly often) for going to war,
For These reasons Tony Blair Should, No Must stand Trial For The unacceptable way he has run amok with his catastrophic policies,Snapping at the Heels of G.W (who should also stand trial), Its Interesting to note that both tony blair and george bush are coming to the end of their terms and leaving us all in this mess (I expect tony will be jetting off to cliff richards house or some desert island somewhere)
This Petition is the only Idea I Have Left, although im fairly sure it will make no difference but you have to try otherwise these swine will walk all over the good people who have to live with the poor decisions made by these corporate figureheads.
JUSTICE!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
